title: Performance and Failure Mechanisms of Alkaline Zinc Anodes with Addition of Calcium Zincate (Ca[Zn(OH)3]2·2H2O) Under Industrially Relevant Conditions
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00093E, Paper

Patrick K Yang, Damon E. Turney, Michael Nyce, Bryan R Wygant, Timothy N. Lambert, Stephen O'Brien, Gautam Yadav, Meir Weiner, Shinju Yang, Brendan E. Hawkins, Sanjoy Banerjee
Additions of calcium zincate (CaZn2(OH)6∙2H2O) to zinc (Zn) anodes in alkaline batteries have been investigated and found to remarkably increase cycle life at high utilization of the anode’s theoretical capacity,...
